# bear ⇔ ⲃⲁⲣⲟⲥ 𓄗

󳧖 ≈ 𓃟 in 𓂧𓃀𓃯 ≈ djambšau 𓃟 𒈚𒂄 dim₃šah₂ "hippo"
󳧖 ≈ 𓃯 in 𓂧𓃀𓃯 𒁕𒁍 da-buʳ דבא debā the Bear 𒈚𒋚 dim₃-šah ?

󳧖 ≈ 𓃗 in 𒊊 PIRIĜ 󳧖 ≈ 𓃟 pork pig 𓄗 phecda 𒊍 ᵖursa bearˢ ≈ 𓃗 ross 𒍽
𒊍 AZ #asu •ʰursu 𒍽 horse 𒀲𒆳𒊏𒍑 KUR.RA.US घोड़ा ghoṛāˢ ≈ 󳧖 Karhuˢ "bear" 𒊍 AZ •ᶠURS bearˢ #asu ursu 𒄯𒁖𒂵𒀸 ḫartakkaš خرس xers ⇔ Aas AS aṣ

AlPheratz (al-faras) horse @ Pegasus

𓐍 𓊪 𓈙 𓄗 𓇼 𓀭 | the Great Bear | Karhu Phecda : ≈ Phecda γ "فخذ الدب الأكبر" Fakhidh ad-Dubb al-Akbar “Thigh of the Great Bear”

  1. heavy burden

𓃀 𒁇 bar
𓉐 port
𓏎 bring
𓊄 𓃀 𓏏 𓏛 | burden | товар to'bear
𓍖 𓊌 ⲃⲁⲣⲟⲥ ⇔ πῠρός πέτρα pétra πῦρ 𒌨𒁉𒌅 ur-bi-tu ⇔ dense

ⲃⲁⲣⲟⲥ 🇬🇷 weight, burden, load, heaviness
βαρύς barús baryo “heavy” => s'bar schwer *swer- “heavy, grave, serious” ⇔ super ?

𒁀 ⲃⲁⲣⲟⲥ ⇔ Barren bar 𒁇

𒄖𒁀𒊒 gu-ba-ru (copper) bar
𒄖𒁀𒊒 (metal) bar, ingot

𒁀𒁀𒇻 ba-ba-lu | bring, leader, to carry | √ bear
𒌑𒁉𒇻 ú-bi-lu ü-bearu bring over

𒌑𒂟𒁉𒌅 𒌑𒁉𒇻 𒀉𒋾𒋙
ú-ṣab-bi-tu ú-bi-lu it-ti-šú
u-seized ü-bearu withi su
taken with him

𒂟𒁉𒇻 zab-bi-lu
